targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("PublishDate",$__interval),
  count("Id") AS "Posts"
FROM "Posts"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("PublishDate")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "Id"
FROM "Latest"
ORDER BY "Id" desc
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  count(*)/(SELECT count(*) FROM "AspNetUsers"ORDER BY 1)
FROM "Follows"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(*)/(SELECT count(*) FROM "AspNetUsers"ORDER BY 1)
FROM "Posts"
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: HTTP requests per endpoint per hour

panels.description: Counts all requests, both successful and failed
panels.title: Requests received by controller

panels.description: Does NOT include requests that were not mapped to an ASP.NET Core controller!
panels.title: Request duration (controller-handled requests only)
